mapper.select: SELECT P.*,M.MEM_NICK FROM PRODUCT P JOIN MEMBER M ON P.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID WHERE P.MEM_ID = #{mem_id};

SELECT pro.PRODUCT_PIC1, pro.PRODUCT_CATEGORY, pro.PRODUCT_TRADE_ADR1, pro.PRODUCT_TITLE, pro.PRODUCT_PRICE, pro.MEM_ID, mem.MEM_NICK, pro.PRODUCT_REG_DATE FROM PRODUCT pro join MEMBER mem ON pro.MEM_ID = mem.MEM_ID WHERE PRODUCT_CATEGORY = #{pRODUCT_CATEGORY}

SELECT O.ORDER_ID , P.PRODUCT_ID , P.PRODUCT_TITLE , P.PRODUCT_PRICE , P.PRODUCT_CATEGORY , P.PRODUCT_STATUS , M.MEM_NICK FROM PRODUCT P JOIN PRODUCT_ORDER O ON P.PRODUCT_ID = O.PRODUCT_ID JOIN MEMBER M ON P.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID WHERE O.BUYER_ID = #{mem_id};
